requiredEquipmentExplanation: The video explicitly mentions that it is a full bodyweight workout that requires no equipment. This is corroborated by the tags such as "full body workout no equipment" and "bodyweight full body workout at home." The description emphasizes building muscle and strength through bodyweight exercises, and the top comment confirms that no equipment is needed by stating, "No equipment needed, yet it challenges every muscle in my body." These data points collectively demonstrate a very high confidence that no equipment is required. Thus, the workout appears to be bodyweight only.
